donor_name: MINISTRY OF FAMILY, VETERANS AFFAIRS AND INTERGENERATIONAL SOLIDARITY OF REPUBLIC OF CROTIA
MINISTRY OF HEALTH AND SOCIAL WELFARE
outputs.output_descr: SI mapping completed, 2 stakeholder consultations conducted, MHSW provided with social indicators, Social welfare law review prepared, residential institutions assessed, draft action plan for the development of community social services finished.

donor_name: MINISTRY OF FAMILY, VETERANS AFFAIRS AND INTERGENERATIONAL SOLIDARITY OF REPUBLIC OF CROTIA
outputs.output_descr:
THE RIGHT TO LIVE IN THE COMMUNITY, SOCIAL INCLUSION AND PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES:
Support to excluded groups through community based services: support services for children with disabilities living in specialised foster care; development of a model of educational inclusion;  employability and employment opportunities analysis; support for development of national M&E system (UN Convention implementation and national disability strategy); advocacy.
Comprehensive Inclusion Programme for Roma in the Medjimurje County in Croatia

outputs.output_descr:
Addressing the needs of wartime victims of sexual violence in Croatia:
An unresolved legacy of the 1991-95 war

project_descr: Strenghtening social inclusion governance with emphasis on support to marginalized groups
